price: Inni (Rabbiin) Isa halkan uffata, hirriba immoo boqonnaa isiniif taasise. Guyyaa yeroo olii gadi sochootan taasiseedha
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلَّيۡلَ لِبَاسٗا وَٱلنَّوۡمَ سُبَاتٗا وَجَعَلَ ٱلنَّهَارَ نُشُورٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī jaʿala lakumu al-layla libāsan wal-nawma subātan wajaʿala al-nahāra nushūran
